items.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial updates: Ventura challenged about text message exchanges
items.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs is standing trial on sex trafficking and racketeering charges in a case that has captured widespread attention.

items.title: WATCH:  Diver's heart-stopping moment as shark attacks camera
items.description: A diver captured the terrifying moment sharks attacked a camera his friend was holding while they traversed a reef in Australia’s Coral Sea.
